description:
EVO HTML to Converter for WinRT and Windows Phone is a portable .NET library that can be used in Windows Store Applications for Windows and for Windows Phone. 

While the EVO HTML to PDF Converter Library for .NET does not depend on any external services or programs, the solution for WinRT and Windows Phone requires the installation of a HTML to PDF server which was built on the library for .NET. The HTML to PDF server can run in a Windows Service or in an Azure Cloud Service. The client library you link in your application can talk to HTML to PDF Server completely transparent for you offering an API and a functionality similar to the library for .NET.

The converter offers full support for HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, SVG, web fonts, page breaks control with CSS and from API, automatically repeated HTML table header and footer, live URLs and internal links, automatically generated hierarchical bookmarks and table of contents, automatically generated fillable PDF forms and allows you to digitally sign and password protect the generated PDF documents.
summary: Convert HTML to PDF in your Windows Store applications for WinRT and Windows Phone using the EVO HTML to PDF Converter Portable Library.
title: EVO HTML to PDF Converter Client for WinRT and Windows Phone
